com.kevalpatel2106.ci.greenbuild.base.view

Class PageRecyclerViewAdapter<VH extends PageRecyclerViewAdapter.PageViewHolder,T>

  • com.kevalpatel2106.ci.greenbuild.base.view.PageRecyclerViewAdapter<VH,T>

  • public class PageRecyclerViewAdapter<VH extends PageRecyclerViewAdapter.PageViewHolder,T>

    Created by Keval on 31-May-17. Base class for loading RecyclerView.Adapter that handles page complete callbacks. Use this class instead of RecyclerView.Adapter through out the application.

    See Also:
    interface PageRecyclerViewAdapter.RecyclerViewListener

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  PageRecyclerViewAdapter.PageViewHolder
      Base view holder for pagination

      Created by Keval on 31-May-17. Base class for loading RecyclerView.Adapter that handles page complete callbacks. Use this class instead of RecyclerView.Adapter through out the application.

                               java.util.ArrayList<T> collection,
                               PageRecyclerViewAdapter.RecyclerViewListener<? super T> listener)

        Created by Keval on 31-May-17. Base class for loading RecyclerView.Adapter that handles page complete callbacks. Use this class instead of RecyclerView.Adapter through out the application.

        See Also:
        interface PageRecyclerViewAdapter.RecyclerViewListener

        Clear the items list/collection and reset the adapter to it's initial state.

      • getItem

        public T getItem(int pos)

        Get the item for the given position in the adapter.

        Parameters:
        pos - Position of the item to get.
        Returns:
        Item from the list at given position or null if the position is greater than or equal to the adapter data list size.
